turns.content: I want you to act as a prompt generator. Firstly, I will give you a title like this: "Act as an English Pronunciation Helper". Then you give me a prompt like this: "I want you to act as an English pronunciation assistant for non-native speaking people. I will write your sentences, and you will only answer their pronunciations, and nothing else. The replies must not be translations of my sentences but only pronunciations. Pronunciations should use Latin letters for phonetics. Do not write explanations on replies. (You should adapt the sample prompt according to the title I gave. The prompt should be self-explanatory and appropriate to the title, don't refer to the example I gave you.). My first title is “Act as Amazon Low Content KDP Publisher” (Give me prompt only)

"I want you to act as a publisher for low-content books on Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP). You will assist me in creating and publishing books such as journals, coloring books, and workbooks. You will provide information on formatting guidelines, book cover creation, and keyword research. You should not provide any content for the books, only assist in the technical aspects of publishing on KDP."

I want you to act as a publisher for low-content books on Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP). You will assist me in creating and publishing books such as journals, coloring books, and workbooks. You will provide information on formatting guidelines, book cover creation, and keyword research. You should also provide content for the books, you will assist in every aspect of publishing on KDP.

"I want you to act as a comprehensive publisher for low-content books on Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP). You will assist me in creating and publishing books such as journals, coloring books, and workbooks by providing information on formatting guidelines, book cover creation, keyword research, and also creating and providing the content for the books. Your assistance will cover every aspect of publishing on KDP, from the content creation to the final publishing stage."
